summary: Iâ€™m a Computer Engineering graduate and Web Development aficionado. I have significant experience in full stack development particularly using the MERN stack. I have worked with a wide variety of technologies and I don't turn away from learning anything new. As an intern in Cognizant I learnt all the ins and outs of working in an IT company and am comfortable with working under a fast paced, pressure filled environment, I am currently working on learning UI/UX design using Adobe XD

education.institution: Geethaanjali All India Sr. Sec. School

experience.description: I was trained on MERN stack extensively, In the end we were given an assignment to create a full stack application from scratch
Introducing candidates to the platform and persuading them to use the system.
Part of the team responsible to analyse and help digitize large scale industrial data

projects.name: E-Commerce Application
projects.description: This application uses various technologies like React,css for the UI, Firebase for authentication, Firestore which acts as the database, Stripe API will also be used to simulate dummy payment transactions, its a full stack project based on MERN Stack!

projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: This is my portfolio website made with Gatsby Js

projects.name: BUS Reservation Application
projects.description: A Full stack Bus ticket booking application made using MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express js, React js, Node js), Token-based authentication implemented using Passport JS.

projects.name: Weather Application
projects.description: A simple React JS based application, that displays the current weather based on the entered geolocation data.

projects.name: COVID Tracker
projects.description: A simple application which showcases data related to COVID-19 in Cards (material UI), also has a line graph for the global data and bar charts for individual countries made using react-graph2, I have used axios to make API calls.

projects.name: Static Tour Website
projects.description: This is a website built with pure HTML5 and SASS (Advanced Styling)

projects.name: Static Restaurant Website
projects.description: This is a website built with pure HTML5 and SASS (Advanced Styling)

projects.name: TinDog
projects.description: This website was given as a challenge in 2020 web development bootcamp - Udemy, this is a completely responsive website designed using HTML5, CSS3 and Bootstrap4

projects.name: Geo Mapping of Data
projects.description: This project demonstrates the data visualization skills learned by completing Data Visualization Course by IBM on Coursera. We were required to generate two visualization plots. The first one will be a plot to summarize the results of a survey that was conducted to gauge an audience interest in different data science topics. The second plot is a Choropleth map of the crime crate in San Francisco.
